final_answer.explanation: The American Radio Relay League (ARRL) was founded on April 6, 1914. To calculate the difference between this founding year and the year 2024, we perform the following calculation: 2024 - 1914 = 110 years. This means that as of 2024, the ARRL will have been in existence for 110 years. This information is important as it highlights the longevity of the organization and its historical significance in the amateur radio community. The founding year is verified through multiple reliable sources, confirming its accuracy and relevance for the calculation.

graph.title: Calculate Year Difference
graph.content: <116>[Calculate Year Difference] Calculate the difference between the year 2024 and the founding year of the ARRL (1914). This will provide the answer to the question regarding the time span since the organization was established.</116>
graph.answer:
To calculate the difference between the year 2024 and the founding year of the American Radio Relay League (ARRL), which is 1914, we perform the following calculation:

1. Identify the years involved:
   - Founding year of ARRL: 1914
   - Current year for calculation: 2024

2. Calculate the difference:
   - Difference = Current year - Founding year
   - Difference = 2024 - 1914
   - Difference = 110

Thus, the time span since the organization was established in 1914 until the year 2024 is 110 years.
